title: Bug 10022 - Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: When using the Java perspective, the "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu is always enabled, even if a build has already been completed. This is not the expected behavior.
OB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, regardless of whether a build has been performed or not.
EB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled if a build has not been completed yet. If a build has already been performed, the "Build" action should be disabled.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Java perspective. 2. Right-click on a project in the package explorer. 3. Observe that the "Build" option in the context sensitive popup menu is always enabled, even if a build has already been completed.
